channel.title: cell expansion on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in cell expansion on funPlantGenes

item.title: BcXTH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BcXTH1 Gene Name: Xyloglucan endotransglucosylase/hydrolase1 Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: BcXTH1, a Brassica campestris homologue of Arabidopsis XTH9, is associated with cell expansion.

item.title: ClEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA1 Gene Name: α-expansin1 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: ClEXPA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA2 Gene Name: α-expansin2 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: CsKF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa7M446860 Gene Symbol: CsKF1 Gene Name: Kinesin protein1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Characterization and expression profiling of cucumber kinesin genes during early fruit development: revealing the roles of kinesins in exponential cell production and enlargement in cucumber fruit.

item.title: CsKF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3M062600 Gene Symbol: CsKF2 Gene Name: Kinesin protein2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Characterization and expression profiling of cucumber kinesin genes during early fruit development: revealing the roles of kinesins in exponential cell production and enlargement in cucumber fruit.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4M002000 Gene Symbol: CsKF3 Gene Name: Kinesin protein3 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Characterization and expression profiling of cucumber kinesin genes during early fruit development: revealing the roles of kinesins in exponential cell production and enlargement in cucumber fruit.

item.title: CsMYB36
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa2G352940 Gene Symbol: CsMYB36 Gene Name: MYB DOMAIN PROTEIN 36 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CsMYB36 regulates fruit neck length via mediating cell expansion in cucumber.

item.title: CsTIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: orange1.1g023108 Gene Symbol: CsTIP2|1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Expression of the citrus CsTIP2|1|CsTIP2|1 gene improves tobacco plant growth, antioxidant capacity and physiological adaptation under stress conditions.

item.title: CsTRM5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_2G013800 Gene Symbol: CsTRM5 Gene Name: TONNEAU1 recruiting motif protein 5 Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsTRM5 regulates fruit shape via mediating cell division direction and cell expansion in cucumber.

item.title: FaGAST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGAST2 Gene Name: GAST-like gene2 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: FaGAST2, a strawberry ripening-related gene, acts together with FaGAST1 to determine cell size of the fruit receptacle.

item.title: GhPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPK6 Gene Name: pyruvate kinase6 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton cytosolic pyruvate kinase GhPK6 participates in fast fiber elongation regulation in a ROS-mediated manner.

item.title: GhSWEET12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.005G195100 Gene Symbol: GhSWEET12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: RNA-seq and protein−DNA binding assays revealed that GhMYB212 was closely linked to the pathways of sucrose and starch transportation and metabolism, directly controling the expression of a sucrose transporter gene GhSWEET12.

item.title: Pta1-MMP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pta1-MMP Gene Name: matrix metalloproteinase 1 Genome: Species: Pinus taeda Functional Descriptions: Pta1-MMP protein has the structural characteristics of other plant MMPs, the recombinant protein exhibits Zn2+-dependent protease activity, and is inhibited by EDTA and the active site-binding hydroxamate inhibitor GM6001.

item.title: PtrDRIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.007G132700.1 Gene Symbol: PtrDRIF1 Gene Name: DIVARICATA AND RADIALIS INTERACTING FACTOR 1 Genome: Phytozome: Populus trichocarpa v3.

item.title: PttEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PttEXPA1 Gene Name: alpha-expansin 1 Genome: Species: Populus tremula x Populus tremuloides Functional Descriptions: Ectopic expression of a wood-abundant expansin PttEXPA1 promotes cell expansion in primary and secondary tissues in aspen.

item.title: Rh-PIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Rh-PIP2|1 Gene Name: plasma membrane aquaporin Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaa Functional Descriptions: Rh-PIP2|1|Rh-PIP2|1, a Rose Aquaporin Gene, Is Involved in Ethylene-Regulated Petal Expansion.

item.title: SaVHAc1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SaVHAc1 Gene Name: vacuolar ATPase subunit c1 Genome: Species: Spartina alterniflora Functional Descriptions: Enhanced salt stress tolerance of rice plants expressing a vacuolar H+-ATPase subunit c1 (SaVHAc1) gene from the halophyte grass Spartina alterniflora.

item.title: Sl-IAA17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Sl-IAA17 Gene Name: auxin/indole acetic acid 17 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The Auxin Sl-IAA17 Transcriptional Repressor Controls Fruit Size Via the Regulation of Endoreduplication-Related Cell Expansion.

item.title: SlGA2ox1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlGA2ox1 Gene Name: gibberellin 2-oxidase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterization of tomato gibberellin 2-oxidases (GA2oxs) and effects of fruit-specific SlGA2ox1 overexpression on fruit and seed growth and development.

item.title: SlKIX8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc07g008100 Gene Symbol: SlKIX8 Gene Name: KINASE-INDUCIBLE DOMAIN INTERACTING 8 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlKIX8 and SlKIX9 are negative regulators of leaf and fruit growth in tomato.

item.title: SlKIX9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g059700 Gene Symbol: SlKIX9 Gene Name: KINASE-INDUCIBLE DOMAIN INTERACTING 9 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlKIX8 and SlKIX9 are negative regulators of leaf and fruit growth in tomato.

item.title: SlLBD40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g085910 Gene Symbol: SlLBD40 Gene Name: LOB DOMAIN-CONTAINING PROTEIN 40 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of SlLBD40 significantly promoted fruit growth by promoting mesocarp cell expansion, while knockout of SlLBD40 showed the opposite result.

item.title: SlMBP21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlMBP21 Gene Name: MADS-box protein 21 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The MADS-Box Gene SlMBP21 Regulates Sepal Size Mediated by Ethylene and Auxin in Tomato.

item.title: SlMYC1

item.title: SlMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g076930 Gene Symbol: SlMYC2 Gene Name: transcription factor MYC2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlMYC2, a master regulator of Jasmonic acid response, has been found to exhibit high expression levels in fruit and has been implicated in the regulation of fruit ripening and resistance to Botrytis.
